LanguageData.MakeConcrete.label: make 30 concrete
LanguageData.MakeConcrete.description: Mix crushed rock, sand and cement with water to form concrete.
LanguageData.MakeConcrete5.label: make 150 concrete
LanguageData.MakeConcrete5.description: Mix crushed rock, sand and cement with water to form concrete.
LanguageData.MakeConcreteOneStep.label: make 30 concrete (single step)
LanguageData.MakeConcreteOneStep.description: Break up stone chunks into crushed rock and sand, then combine them with cement and water to form concrete. (It requires a bit more total work than if the crushed rocks and sand are made separately and then combined with concrete, but it's only a single step.)
LanguageData.MakeConcreteBlocks.label: make 75 concrete blocks

(It requires a bit more total work than if the crushed rocks and sand are made separately and then combined with concrete, but it's only a single step.)
LanguageData.MakeConcreteBlocksRM.label: make 75 concrete blocks
